purpose: Project summary for akeyless-server-commons - a comprehensive Node.js/TypeScript server utilities package that provides shared functionality for Akeyless microservices.

sections.title: Overview
sections.description: akeyless-server-commons is a comprehensive Node.js/TypeScript server utilities package that provides shared functionality for Akeyless microservices. It offers a standardized set of helpers, managers, middlewares, and types that ensure consistency across all server-side applications.

sections.title: What This Package Contains
sections.description: The package exports four main modules:
points: ./middlewares - Express middleware for common server needs
./types - Shared TypeScript types, interfaces, and enums

sections.title: Key Features
points: Environment Validation - Validates required environment variables on startup
Real-time Data Sync - Firebase snapshots and Redis Pub/Sub for live cache updates
Multi-provider SMS - Automatic routing (Multisend/Twilio/Monogoto) based on phone number
Audit Logging - Built-in audit trail for emails, SMS, and operations
Translation Support - Multi-language support for notifications and UI
Type Safety - Comprehensive TypeScript types for all APIs

context: This package provides standardized functionality for Akeyless microservices:
Consistency - Same patterns and utilities across all services
Real-time Sync - Firebase and Redis snapshot support
Communication - Email, SMS, and push notifications
Request Handling - Validation, auth, logging, error handling
